runtime_checks.import_command: python3 -c "from scrapers.actions.handlers.ai_search import AISearchAction; print('✓ AISearchAction import OK')"
runtime_checks.registry_command: python3 -c "from scrapers.actions.registry import ActionRegistry; print('ai_search' in ActionRegistry._registry)"

notes: AISearchAction uses Brave Search API endpoint with async httpx client.
Retry logic implemented for timeout/network/http/decoding failures.
Results include url, title, description, domain, and score.
Scoring prioritizes SKU matches and common product domains.
